answerText: serialization[10] This language provides a serializable interface as well as a toString method. One can output text in this language using the system.out.println (system dot out dot print line) method.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Seven Lakes/Rockefeller  | 13 | Science | Computer Science | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This procedure is similar to marshalling. For 10 points each: [10] Name this process of converting an object or data structure into a sequence of bytes that can be stored in a file, database, or even sent to another computer.
